de.mpa.io.fasta

Class FastaLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mpa.io.fasta.FastaLoader

  • public class FastaLoader
extends Object
    Singleton class providing FASTA read/write capabilities via random access file.
    Author:
    Thilo Muth, K. Schallert

                                                                                 SQLException
        updates a map with accessions and DigFASTAEntry-Objects and adds data as necessary
        Parameters:
        proteinmap. - A map containing protein hits as MascotProteinHit-objects with protein accessions as keys
        Returns:
        proteinmap. The updated map is returned
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - when the file could not be found.

      • addFastaDatabases

        public static void addFastaDatabases(File fastaFile,
                                     String dbName,
                                     int batchSize)
                              throws IOException,
                                     SQLException
        Methode which reads ONE *.fasta and creates an MPA compatible *.fasta.
        Parameters:
        fastaFile. - File of the input *.fastas.
        outpath. - The output *.fasta file.
        batchSize. - Number of entries which should be stored in by one query
        mascotFlag. - Flag for the creation of a new Fasta add the specified direction.
        Throws:
        IOException
        SQLException
